value.title: StarCraft 2: EPIC Games on Moondance - The BEST New Map?
value.excerpt: In this video I casted two professional games of StarCraft 2 on Moondance. Moondance is a map with a lot of bases but a short rush distance. A pocket third offers players a safe expansion but it has less mineral nodes than a regular base and only one gas geyser. This map is made by Marras, who also created
